      • emit

        public final def emit(eventSource : UUID,
                      event : Event,
                      scope : Scope<Address>) : void 
        Description copied from class: AbstractEventSpace
        Emit the given event in the given scope.

        This function emits on the internal event bus of the agent (call to AbstractEventSpace.doEmit(Event, Scope)), and on the network.

        Parameters:
        eventSource - the source of the event.
        event - the event to emit.
        scope - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.
        Since:
        2.0.6.0

      • doEmit

        protected def doEmit(event : Event,
                     scope : Scope<? super Address>) : void 
        Description copied from class: AbstractEventSpace
        Do the emission of the event.

        This function emits the event only on the internal event bus of the agents.

        Parameters:
        event - the event to emit.
        scope - description of the scope of the event, i.e. the receivers of the event.
